0.name: Dwight Fairfield
0.bio:
A nervous leader, able to locate his allies and increase their effectiveness.

His personal perks, Bond, Prove Thyself and Leader, allow him to get in proximity of other Survivors and provide bonuses to their actions as well as his own.

1.name: Meg Thomas
1.bio:
An energetic athlete, able to outrun most Killers.

Her personal perks, Quick & Quiet, Sprint Burst and Adrenaline, give her advantage to escape chases and put distance between herself and the Killer.

2.name: Claudette Morel
2.bio:
A studious botanist, able to boost her team's survivability as well as her own.

Her personal perks, Empathy, Botany Knowledge and Self Care, allow her to spot injured Survivors and heal her team and herself more effectively.

3.name: Jake Park
3.bio:
A solitary survivalist, able to hold his own in most situations.

His personal perks, Iron Will, Calm Spirit and Saboteur, allow him to more effectively move about the environment and survive while injured.

4.name: Nea Karlsson
4.bio:
An urban artist, able to easily escape and hide.

Her personal perks, Balanced Landing, Urban Evasion and Streetwise, make her well suited to completing objectives and rapid evasion.

5.name: Laurie Strode
5.bio:
A determined Survivor, prepared to weather any challenge.

Her personal perks, Sole Survivor, Object of Obsession and Decisive Strike, grant her powerful survival abilities at the cost of leaving her exposed.

6.name: Ace Visconti
6.bio:
A lucky gambler, improving the odds of the entire team.

His personal perks, Open Handed, Up the Ante and Ace in the Hole, boost the Luck of all Survivors and help with unlocking chests.

7.name: William "Bill" Overbeck
7.bio:
An old soldier, accustomed to dealing with critical situations.

His personal perks, Left Behind, Borrowed Time and Unbreakable, make him more powerful in dire moments.

8.name: Feng Min
8.bio:
An objective-focused competitor who can quickly adapt her strategy to meet a vast range of challenging situations.

Her personal perks, Technician, Lithe and Alert, help her with repairing generators and locating the Killer.

9.name: David King
9.bio:
A rugged scrapper, rewarding high-risk play.

His personal perks, We're Gonna Live Forever, Dead Hard and No Mither, reward an aggressive, confrontational playstyle but leave him vulnerable.

11.name: Quentin Smith
11.bio:
A resolute dreamwalker, increasing the survivability and recovery of his team.

His personal perks, Wake Up!, Pharmacy and Vigil, help Survivors locate exit gates and recover more easily.

12.name: Detective Tapp
12.bio:
An obsessed detective, able to locate and complete objectives faster.

His personal perks, Tenacity, Detective's Hunch and Stake Out, make him objective-focused and able to rapidly recover.

13.name: Adam Francis
13.bio:
A resourceful teacher, able to adapt to new circumstances and develop strategies accordingly.

His personal perks, Diversion, Deliverance and Autodidact, help him to distract The Killer, survive desperate situations, and become more skilled as the trial continues.

14.name: Jeff Johansen
14.bio:
A quiet artist, standing steadfast against impossible odds.

His personal perks, Breakdown, Aftercare and Distortion, give him observational advantages and help to hide his presence from The Killer.
